about_the_game:
🚁"Alien Black Ops"

Become an Armed Forces Helicopter Pilot in a secret operation to recover alien debris that escalates into a war. With realistic physics-based flight mechanics, your main mission is to rescue downed soldiers and destroy the alien threat.

🏞️ Explore stunning and diverse environments that unfold a story across 4 chapters, each set in unique biomes. In each chapter, take on four challenging missions, culminating in an epic showdown with a Big Boss

This DEMO has Only One of the four Environments.

  • 1 Biomes: Jungle Islands

  • Day and Night Missions

🔧 Customize and upgrade your helicopter with advanced weapons, powerful shields, and experimental secret technology captured from the invaders.

🎯 Master piloting skills to evade enemies and execute tactical maneuvers in battles against challenging bosses.
detailed_description:
🚁"Alien Black Ops"

Become an Armed Forces Helicopter Pilot in a secret operation to recover alien debris that escalates into a war. With realistic physics-based flight mechanics, your main mission is to rescue downed soldiers and destroy the alien threat.

🏞️ Explore stunning and diverse environments that unfold a story across 4 chapters, each set in unique biomes. In each chapter, take on four challenging missions, culminating in an epic showdown with a Big Boss

This DEMO has Only One of the four Environments.

  • 1 Biomes: Jungle Islands

  • Day and Night Missions

🔧 Customize and upgrade your helicopter with advanced weapons, powerful shields, and experimental secret technology captured from the invaders.

🎯 Master piloting skills to evade enemies and execute tactical maneuvers in battles against challenging bosses.
name: Alien Black Ops Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2.2Ghz+ with 8+ cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1660 6GB+ Or Radeon RX 590 6GB+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alien Black Ops is currently in development, and minimum specifications may change prior to release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 3.0Ghz+ with 16+ cores
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX4070+ 12GB+ Or AMD Radeon RX7800+ 12GB+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alien Black Ops is currently in development, and minimum specifications may change prior to release.

short_description: Become an elite Armed Forces pilot on a classified operation to rescue downed soldiers and recover alien artifacts. Use their advanced tech to upgrade your helicopter, overpower the alien menace, and uncover their sinister plan to take control of humanity.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, German
*languages with full audio support
